Fire DON hire someone that knows what he is doing, maybe then he can stop comping out meals!!!!!! And make it enjoyable!!!

Overall, a great place to eat.  However, the one negative on JT Walkers is they serve THE WEAKEST mixed drinks we have ever had.  I seriously wonder if they even put alcohol in them.  We have experienced this on numerous occasions, both in the main dining room and upstairs with a number of different bartenders.  Its discouraging to pay $6+ for a drink and get syrup and flavored fillers.  On the positive side, they have expanded their craft beer selection and have a very nice selection both draft and bottle.  They also have a great appetizer selection and all are excellent.  Their entree selection is fair and needs rotated.  However, we have been pleased with the quality and quantity of food we have had.  If JT would take a lesson from Boltini's and serve a quality mixed drink he would deserve a 5-star rating.
Very professional tattoo shop. Justin has done multiple of my tattoos and a piercing I would recommend this tattoo shop! The owner will always help you out when needed!

The burger was so tiny and when I told the cook perhaps owner all he said was "really" no customer service. They don't care about the customer. My brother and I will never eat here again   This is not a gourmet burger establishment. Terrible
Holly the owner lies to your face l won't be back. Plato's closet is ridiculous!!! I wish I could post negative stars.

I had contacted this company about coming to my twin girls' 7th birthday party. My girls declared they were too old for a princess and she suggested having a "diva" hostess party.  I also had ponies at the party.  Everything ran smoothly and I was impressed with her outfit and hair which looked perfect as a diva hostess.  The girls were enthralled with her.  She did some games and led some dances and singing.  Afterwards she did face painting and even balloons. I have recommended her to others and will continue to do so. It really added a special and memorable experience for everyone at the party!

We have been going there for over 2 years.  My girls only do the recreational program but they have something for girls and boys from ages 3 & up. They have a competitive team and another program that some of my friends' children have been invited to join as a fast track to preparing for competitive gymnastics. My girls have had positive coaches and lots of fun.  I like that they see the team practicing when they are there so they can see what dedication and talent those girls have. I also like that they have several levels that your child moves up so they feel a sense of accomplishment.  Every few sessions they evaluate your child and the skills they have as mastered, still working or beginning.  I feel like kids can progress and the coaches are aware of when the kids are ready to do so. My girls have moved up 4 levels since we started.  When they are ready to move up, they do, they don't have to even wait for the next session.  Since we do recreational gymmastics, I feel it has been an excellent balance of conditioning , skills, and fun that keeps my girls looking forward to going to gymnastics for over 2 years now!  We had their birthday party there and it was great.  You can choose to go 1x, 2x or 3x a week to help fit your goals for your athlete. They also offer a free trial class!
Great experience! Rhianna took great care of my wife. She is so relaxed after getting spoiled. Clean facility classy decor. Friendly staff . Gave us local discount.

Went for Easter brunch after church.
Was really good lots of selections.
Line
Moved pretty quickly.
Our server was Laurie she
Was very personable .

Love this place! We had
Calamari ,
Pizza margherita and artichoke Joe....
Great with beers
And good wine!!!  We come here anout once a month great place!

Great salads and sandwiches a huge variety to pick from.  Everything looks freshand clean as we entered .
We went basic today with a tuna hoagie and caesar salad , wife had the soup of the day said it was  very good. 
Good prices. Convenient.

Lively place,
Nice view of city.
Server, busser ,
Excellent.
Nachos disappointing, came
Out
Well
Done and looked
Less
Than appetizing.
Pork entree was good, my wifes
Vegetarian enchiladas were
Average. Lots of
Food for the price .
Our family has been coming to Dr Johnson for many years.  He is by himself not part of a group which is a definate plus. He is right on with diagnoses .... A rare breed in this part of the country.

No worse customer service than having your customer ask what kind of juice do you have and the server pointing to the menu and replying it's on the menu!!

Seriously?!!!! Okay food and bad server.

Do NOT use this company. The guy Arnie is a con artist. Look up his records.
He should be in jail not in business.

Came in for lunch. Good soup potato and chicken enchilada. Nice salads had the southwest chicken salad with quesodilla.
Flavored teas are good too. The hostess is an older
Lady who is sweeter than pie. Perfect way to be greeted.

Awesome decor in this little restaurant. Food is delicious and a little different than traditional Mexican restaurants, more like from Mexico City. Waiter was super friendly and attentive. Get the sangria!

The breakfast is always great. But the new angus burgers are superb. I have been coming here for years and I don't see that changing. If you want to relax and watch the world fly by you should take a seat by the window and enjoy the food and service.

Bland, Plan, Boring lack of taste... If you want cheap horrible mexican food This is it.
I was so bummed out my party of 5 all left there plates almost full Great tap water horrible food 

  "MY ADVICE STAY AWAY BLAND TASTELESS FOOD YUCK  SUPER SAD"
I needed a haircut on the fly so I called and got in right away. He did a great job on my hair.

What a wonderful company to have do work on your vehicle.From the time that I called I was surprised at the way that this company treats you on the phone and in person. They were very  professional.I received a call the day before to confirm our appointment and Eric called when he was on his way.Eric did an excellant job and checked and double checked the car when he was done. I would recommend this company to anyone.

I was planning a birthday party for my mother, and having recently moved back to Calgary after living in Texas for 15 years, I was unfamiliar with the local bakeries. A quick google search and a check on Yelp led me to Orchid Pastry, a locally owned shop in a strip mall on Centre street not too far from my house. Their website gave me a good idea of the types of pastries they offer, and I was sold when I saw that they make a tiramisu cake with real fresh cream. I ordered a 1/2 sheet for $70 which could probably feed about 35 people and was very impressed when I went to go pick it up. The cake was gorgeous, and the flavour was everything I had been dreaming about since I ordered the cake a few days earlier. Light, fluffy layers of cake sandwiched between light, creamy layers of espresso flavored tiramisu goodness. Everyone at the party loved it (most importantly, my mother), and wanted to know where it came from. I was happy to refer them to Orchid. I will order from them again and can't wait to go back to try some of the other pastries they serve in the shop!

Myself and Wife had visited Vegas for ??? - Yes Pure fun and stumbled on Namaste Indian Cuisine. It was the best food we had in Vegas. The owner Melque was so kind and attentive and always going out of way to make us feel comfortable. The food was of course amazing and me being Vegan - I was just amazed at the choices. So we decided to go back again before we left Vegas for Buffet and the food again was just excellent. Everything was fresh and service always the best. To top off the wonderful food - Melque( the owner - a professional singer ) also sang some beautiful notes for us and made our lunch special. So what can you ask more - Good food - Good Music and Good Ambiance. We will surely be back when we are in Vegas - We miss you Melque!!!!!!! and of course the wonderful food - Please open one in Denver CO and we will be your loyal customers!! Keep up the great service and food.

Sairam Hiremagalur and Sinduja Raghavan
Denver CO

Food was very good, good prices and excellent service from the staff. Located in the o2 bar which is a fun bar environment with plenty of bar games. I cery relaxed nice environment to unwind at the end of the day.
If the classic root beers and sodas don't sell you then the burgers will. Lots of choices of burgers but every one of them is great!

I have been their customer for years and have always received an excellent service. Not once I have seen difference in excellency of services, product prices are very competitive. I recommend this store for all the smokers and specially hookah enthusiasts.
Anything in their menu is delicious, I have tried all famous Greek restaurants, this one by far is the best.

Price wise good however the rice wasn't good, it was under cooked. The yogurt sauce wasn't same as I tried middle eastern or Mediterranean  sauces elsewhere. Service was good that's why it will be unfair to give them less than 3 stars ***

I have been there many times of the last few years. I LOVE their garlic naan bread!
I used to love their Chicken Korma, but over the last few months they have changed the recipe or use a commerical sauce. It is thinner and yellower than it used to be, and just isnt as good.  I will go back and try another dish, but miss my favorite korma!
I was there last week and a young lady was our server. She was very attentive!

This review is strictly for the ICU. My father lives out of state and was rushed to the hospital in Arizona. They didn't have the resources to treat him and sent him to Sunrise. We are out of state in California and having to deal over the phone. The nursing staff was amazing and the doctors were kind and informative. He was in ICU for a week when we had to make some end of life decisions. We drove in from Los Angeles and met with Dwight, the overnight nurse. He was patient, kind, understanding, compassionate, there aren't enough adjectives. The next morning, we had to make the decision to take him off life support. It's not easy but it was made a lot less painful by having nurse Kevin there. Not only was he super supportive, caring, patient...he listened to everything, he called funeral places for me, he brought my niece and nephew apple juice in the waiting room and stayed with us until my father passed on. He is an amazing nurse and wonderful human. I hope he knows how much we appreciated him on one of the hardest days of our life.

777 is all you need to know when visiting Mr. Lucky's.

I had heard from a friend about this off the menu deal that gave me a steak, 3 shrimp skewers, and some mashed potatoes, BOMB.com for the $7.77 price tag.  AND there's nothing a little A1 and ketchup couldn't fix. 

For what it is, I can't complain.  You get a whole lotta bang for not a lotta bucks.   I say you pocket the savings and go help support the local dance bars, win win for all.

I started the HCG program 3 months ago and I've lost 35 lbs already. The staff is so helpful and really support your weight loss. I'm half way there into my goal weight so I look forward to dropping more pounds!

Talk about excellent customer service! I cannot say much more about this company than that it is simply the best plumbing service I've ever received. The customer service is on point. I love how they follow up with you after the service they've done for you. The follow up calls are great bc it shows that they really about their customers and their work. I can see they take a lot of pride in their service and follow through till the end. Also, I love how they are 24/7 for emergency needs or to simply talk to a professional on the phone to troubleshoot the problem. 
Just today I received a card from them with a Starbucks gift card and magnet from Pure Plumbing. What other company does that?? 
I recommend Pure Plumbing to anyone who wants fast and efficient service with their plumbing needs. Can't say more than that they are wonderful and has helped solved our plumbing problems!
Affordable, Responsive and Reliable. I had a good experience.

I bought a toyota Sienna SE at Longo Toyota in Los Angeles and for the first 20k miles they have been handling the service maintenance of my minivan. They have excellent customer service at Longo. When you come in you are greeted right away by people who value their customers. They ask you what you needed done and if you have any concerns. They ask you if you need a ride somewhere incase you don't want to wait and if you are waiting they will direct you to their lounge and inform you of all the amenities that they have. If they told you it will be done in 45mins it usually gets done. But if not you usually get a call informing you of the situation and apologizing for making you wait more than you should. After your car service the service manager will approach (if waiting) and let you know your car service is done. He will CLEARLY explain everything that was done to your car  and inform you if there is something else that needed to be done right away or in the near future. 

All of these things i mentioned are lacking at Centennial Toyota. Basically they just ask you what you need done and they take your info and your keys. After service is done they call you and get the payment and have you on your way. All of this is mediocre service. 

At 34k miles i had my van serviced at centennial toyota which includes tire rotation. And at 39k i was having the tires replaced at discount tires and was shocked at what i saw. All 4 tires were worn out and cracked on the inside wall (not visible unless you remove tire). The steel belts were visible and protruding out. I knew they were worn out but i didnt know they were that bad. The guy at Discount Tires told me that i was lucky it didnt rupture. He also told me that this kind of damage didnt happen overnight. That if i had the car serviced 34k miles they should have noticed the problem and should have informed me. 

Immediately after having the tires replaced I went to Centennial Toyota to get an explanation from them. Why is it that they never informed me how seriuosly worn out my tires were. And all i got from them was this answer "I'm sorry but we cannot bring back the past and see exactly what the person handling your service told you or didnt tell you. There are no video cameras here to substantiate your claim that you were not informed about your tires". 

So to everyone reading this, if you value your safety and the safety of your family/passengers DO NOT BRING you car for service here!!!!
Horrible buffet and customer service! They charge a 2 year old child who doesn't eat crab $30, which is ridiculous. The quality of the food has gone down, no gelato.
I waited for 20 minutes and still no food. I am disappointed in this location. It's suppose to be fast food not a restaurant. They aren't even busy!

I paid a lot of money for my whole entire family and the service was horrible. The waitress was rude and had us put on plates on her tray. When she thought that we weren't going to tip her she flipped out was very rude. They tell you to leave shortly after your visit!!!!!!!!!
